recommended_degree: Bahasa dan Sastra Inggris, Pendidikan Bahasa Inggris, Bahasa Inggris Untuk Komunikasi Bisnis dan Profesional, Bisnis Internasional, Hubungan Internasional (Sarjana, Diploma)
job_description:
Facilitate communication (if required as an interpreter) during meetings or conferences with international clients or partners.
Assist the marketing team in market research by analyzing trends, consumer behavior, and competitor materials in other language markets.
Translate materials such as product brochures, website descriptions, social media posts, marketing emails, press releases, and advertising content to ensure consistent and accurate messaging across multiple markets.
Maintain good relations with related costumers.
Translate business documents, reports, presentations, and sales and marketing related correspondence from Indonesian to English and vice versa.
